name: Molly Wop
description:
***Content may be offensive to some***

"The whole hoods been callin' you out, cuz. They're cliqued up in the park, head down there and show them what those hands do"

Molly Wop is a fast-paced, first person endless score based beat 'em up. 

Survive as long as you can, each KO earns clout (Points).

WASD - Move

Left Click - Left Punch

Right Click - Right Punch

OOF bar is your health, you can only take 3 hits. Enemies take 2 or 3

Music & Voices: DJRustyLips

QA Testing: Nova

Lead Development: Kyle
